channel.title: Times on My Obsidian Site
channel.description: Recent content in Times on My Obsidian Site

item.description:
everything is happening inside itself

all the science and all the unknown answers its searching for are all saying the same thing because we are thinking about it in one lens but as soon as we get down to the particle layer the lens itself switches, the observer creates the reality of the particle, as soon as we enter the quantum worlds, the laws change we cannot measure things in the same way the same things don’t apply quantum entanglement, string theory, quantum field theory, all say the the same thing, that the time we feel is not real like we imagine, this does not mean we cant imagine it we just have to imagine beyond the reality that we created,

we rate our suffering on the basis of external experience, peoples life conditions, money situation, and trama, however there is suffering in having everything a kind of suffer we don’t know how to talk bad out because its so recent in human history that such large sums of people had have their needs mets and live in worlds where are their needs are met for them this suburban situation is having its first time in history
the atlantion system used the signs from the tranditonal zoaidc but sees them from a different oder, this perse

we use time to define time, an idea we created has now created itself into us

everything we do is in reference to time our conscious experience is in a calculative dance with the time thats moving around us

we want to do the most with it, we want to make some prof of it, we want cash in our hands to know our time has value

and the numbers give us the prof of the value of the time, they give us meaning, they give us food on our table. through numbers we survive so it makes sense that we give them a lot of credit

Time is art 

and like art, 

its value goes up with time, 

The further we get away from the origin of creation,  The more deeply we value its existence  When we create with time,  allowing it to take us over,  The value of our time deepens,  Seconds become more meaningful,  And the essence of the day is imbued,  with the building an inner kingdom,  Let the frequency dig deeper,  The waves of experience craved further into the walls, We let creation through us  We let it take over,  We become the thread,  Conciseness rides its way through the reflections  And threaded through so that the time  Unfolds, it grows and stacks in circles, And cycles, patterns, meaning and senses  Are engaged and tapped into an activate  Process  Time is art

Underneath the sea of infinite scrolling is the desire to give our time away and make it worth something to someone else. We share stuff and cool moments and all sides of our life and what we are saying underneath the surface is I want to take your time, I want to get your attention. We are taking something from each other with this need to entertain, we are feeding our friends, followers, and the world we love, with more and more information. Maybe this information is helpful, but is it helpful that we provoke others to rely on these screens to receive what we need? and what are we taking from their experience by providing this entertainment?

time is how we make sense of our world. time creates the structures, the systems, and the systems within the systems.

time makes all the worlds go round and grow. time is growing at different rates within different worlds. time is growing at different rates within the worlds inside us time is happening at multiple layers at once

we are comprehending different layers of time at the same time we can listen to different layers of time inside us different time layers carry different visions and different memories,

we will go insane before we let it make sense

it would collapse the mental frame work of everything

all this mental frame work is supporting an idea, and all it takes is for that idea to mean something completely different
for all the frame work to collapse

time is an invention that creates the experience that this world is happening outside of ourself

time provokes our perception to seek for numerical validation to make sense of itself
